typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		messageId as string,
		deviceId as string,
		temperature as double,
		humidity as double,
		EventProcessedUtcTime as string,
		PartitionId as string,
		EventEnqueuedUtcTime as string,
		IoTHub as (MessageId as string, CorrelationId as string, ConnectionDeviceId as string, ConnectionDeviceGenerationId as string, EnqueuedTime as string)
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	documentForm: 'documentPerLine') ~> IOTsource
IOTsource split(temperature > 25,
	temperature<= 25,
	disjoint: true) ~> ConditionalSplit1@(Tempgreater25, Tempnotgreater25)
ConditionalSplit1@Tempgreater25 alterRow(upsertIf(true())) ~> AlterRow1
AlterRow1 sink(input(
		messageId as string,
		deviceId as string,
		temperature as double,
		humidity as double,
		EventProcessedUtcTime as string,
		PartitionId as string,
		EventEnqueuedUtcTime as string,
		IoTHubMessageId as string,
		IoTHubCorrelationId as string,
		IoTHubConnectionDeviceId as string,
		IoTHubConnectionDeviceGenerationId as string,
		IoTHubEnqueuedTime as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:true,
	keys:['messageId'],
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		messageId,
		deviceId,
		temperature,
		humidity,
		EventProcessedUtcTime,
		PartitionId,
		EventEnqueuedUtcTime,
		IoTHubMessageId = IoTHub.MessageId,
		IoTHubCorrelationId = IoTHub.CorrelationId,
		IoTHubConnectionDeviceId = IoTHub.ConnectionDeviceId,
		IoTHubConnectionDeviceGenerationId = IoTHub.ConnectionDeviceGenerationId,
		IoTHubEnqueuedTime = IoTHub.EnqueuedTime
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> RDBMSsink
ConditionalSplit1@Tempnotgreater25 sink(input(
		messageId as string,
		deviceId as string,
		temperature as double,
		humidity as double,
		EventProcessedUtcTime as string,
		PartitionId as string,
		EventEnqueuedUtcTime as string,
		IoTHub as (MessageId as string, CorrelationId as string, ConnectionDeviceId as string, ConnectionDeviceGenerationId as string, EnqueuedTime as string)
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> tempjsonoutput
